actions.name: AssociateApprovalRuleTemplateWithRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to associate an approval rule template with a repository

actions.name: BatchAssociateApprovalRuleTemplateWithRepositories
actions.description: Grants permission to associate an approval rule template with multiple repositories in a single operation

actions.name: BatchDescribeMergeConflicts
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about multiple merge conflicts when attempting to merge two commits using either the three-way merge or the squash merge option

actions.name: BatchDisassociateApprovalRuleTemplateFromRepositories
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the association between an approval rule template and multiple repositories in a single operation

actions.name: BatchGetCommits
actions.description: Grants permission to get return information about one or more commits in an AWS CodeCommit repository

actions.name: BatchGetPullRequests
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about one or more pull requests in an AWS CodeCommit repository

actions.name: BatchGetRepositories
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about multiple repositories

actions.name: CancelUploadArchive
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel the uploading of an archive to a pipeline in AWS CodePipeline

actions.name: CreateApprovalRuleTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to create an approval rule template that will automatically create approval rules in pull requests that match the conditions defined in the template; does not grant permission to create approval rules for individual pull requests

actions.name: CreateBranch
actions.description: Grants permission to create a branch in an AWS CodeCommit repository with this API; does not control Git create branch actions

actions.name: CreateCommit
actions.description: Grants permission to add, copy, move or update single or multiple files in a branch in an AWS CodeCommit repository, and generate a commit for the changes in the specified branch

actions.name: CreatePullRequest
actions.description: Grants permission to create a pull request in the specified repository

actions.name: CreatePullRequestApprovalRule
actions.description: Grants permission to create an approval rule specific to an individual pull request; does not grant permission to create approval rule templates

actions.name: CreateRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS CodeCommit repository

actions.name: CreateUnreferencedMergeCommit
actions.description: Grants permission to create an unreferenced commit that contains the result of merging two commits using either the three-way or the squash merge option; does not control Git merge actions

actions.name: DeleteApprovalRuleTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an approval rule template

actions.name: DeleteBranch
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a branch in an AWS CodeCommit repository with this API; does not control Git delete branch actions

actions.name: DeleteCommentContent
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the content of a comment made on a change, file, or commit in a repository

actions.name: DeleteFile
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified file from a specified branch

actions.name: DeletePullRequestApprovalRule
actions.description: Grants permission to delete approval rule created for a pull request if the rule was not created by an approval rule template

actions.name: DeleteRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS CodeCommit repository

actions.name: DescribeMergeConflicts
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about specific merge conflicts when attempting to merge two commits using either the three-way or the squash merge option

actions.name: DescribePullRequestEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about one or more pull request events

actions.name: DisassociateApprovalRuleTemplateFromRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the association between an approval rule template and a repository

actions.name: EvaluatePullRequestApprovalRules
actions.description: Grants permission to evaluate whether a pull request is mergable based on its current approval state and approval rule requirements

actions.name: GetApprovalRuleTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about an approval rule template

actions.name: GetBlob
actions.description: Grants permission to view the encoded content of an individual file in an AWS CodeCommit repository from the AWS CodeCommit console

actions.name: GetBranch
actions.description: Grants permission to get details about a branch in an AWS CodeCommit repository with this API; does not control Git branch actions

actions.name: GetComment
actions.description: Grants permission to get the content of a comment made on a change, file, or commit in a repository

actions.name: GetCommentReactions
actions.description: Grants permission to get the reactions on a comment

actions.name: GetCommentsForComparedCommit
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about comments made on the comparison between two commits

actions.name: GetCommentsForPullRequest
actions.description: Grants permission to get comments made on a pull request

actions.name: GetCommit
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about a commit, including commit message and committer information, with this API; does not control Git log actions

actions.name: GetCommitHistory
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about the history of commits in a repository

actions.name: GetCommitsFromMergeBase
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about the difference between commits in the context of a potential merge

actions.name: GetDifferences
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about the differences between valid commit specifiers such as a branch, tag, HEAD, commit ID, or other fully qualified reference

actions.name: GetFile
actions.description: Grants permission to return the base-64 encoded contents of a specified file and its metadata

actions.name: GetFolder
actions.description: Grants permission to return the contents of a specified folder in a repository

actions.name: GetMergeCommit
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a merge commit created by one of the merge options for pull requests that creates merge commits. Not all merge options create merge commits. This permission does not control Git merge actions

actions.name: GetMergeConflicts
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about merge conflicts between the before and after commit IDs for a pull request in a repository

actions.name: GetMergeOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about merge options for pull requests that can be used to merge two commits; does not control Git merge actions

actions.name: GetObjectIdentifier
actions.description: Grants permission to resolve blobs, trees, and commits to their identifier

actions.name: GetPullRequest
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a pull request in a specified repository

actions.name: GetPullRequestApprovalStates
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current approvals on an inputted pull request

actions.name: GetPullRequestOverrideState
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current override state of a given pull request

actions.name: GetReferences
actions.description: Grants permission to get details about references in an AWS CodeCommit repository; does not control Git reference actions

actions.name: GetRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about an AWS CodeCommit repository

actions.name: GetRepositoryTriggers
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about triggers configured for a repository

actions.name: GetTree
actions.description: Grants permission to view the contents of a specified tree in an AWS CodeCommit repository from the AWS CodeCommit console

actions.name: GetUploadArchiveStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to get status information about an archive upload to a pipeline in AWS CodePipeline

actions.name: GitPull
actions.description: Grants permission to pull information from an AWS CodeCommit repository to a local repo

actions.name: GitPush
actions.description: Grants permission to push information from a local repo to an AWS CodeCommit repository

actions.name: ListApprovalRuleTemplates
actions.description: Grants permission to list all approval rule templates in an AWS Region for the AWS account

actions.name: ListAssociatedApprovalRuleTemplatesForRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to list approval rule templates that are associated with a repository

actions.name: ListBranches
actions.description: Grants permission to list branches for an AWS CodeCommit repository with this API; does not control Git branch actions

actions.name: ListPullRequests
actions.description: Grants permission to list pull requests for a specified repository

actions.name: ListRepositories
actions.description: Grants permission to list information about AWS CodeCommit repositories in the current Region for your AWS account

actions.name: ListRepositoriesForApprovalRuleTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to list repositories that are associated with an approval rule template

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the resource attached to a CodeCommit resource ARN

actions.name: MergeBranchesByFastForward
actions.description: Grants permission to merge two commits into the specified destination branch using the fast-forward merge option

actions.name: MergeBranchesBySquash
actions.description: Grants permission to merge two commits into the specified destination branch using the squash merge option

actions.name: MergeBranchesByThreeWay
actions.description: Grants permission to merge two commits into the specified destination branch using the three-way merge option

actions.name: MergePullRequestByFastForward
actions.description: Grants permission to close a pull request and attempt to merge it into the specified destination branch for that pull request at the specified commit using the fast-forward merge option

actions.name: MergePullRequestBySquash
actions.description: Grants permission to close a pull request and attempt to merge it into the specified destination branch for that pull request at the specified commit using the squash merge option

actions.name: MergePullRequestByThreeWay
actions.description: Grants permission to close a pull request and attempt to merge it into the specified destination branch for that pull request at the specified commit using the three-way merge option

actions.name: OverridePullRequestApprovalRules
actions.description: Grants permission to override all approval rules for a pull request, including approval rules created by a template

actions.name: PostCommentForComparedCommit
actions.description: Grants permission to post a comment on the comparison between two commits

actions.name: PostCommentForPullRequest
actions.description: Grants permission to post a comment on a pull request

actions.name: PostCommentReply
actions.description: Grants permission to post a comment in reply to a comment on a comparison between commits or a pull request

actions.name: PutCommentReaction
actions.description: Grants permission to post a reaction on a comment

actions.name: PutFile
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update a file in a branch in an AWS CodeCommit repository, and generate a commit for the addition in the specified branch

actions.name: PutRepositoryTriggers
actions.description: Grants permission to create, update, or delete triggers for a repository

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to attach resource tags to a CodeCommit resource ARN

actions.name: TestRepositoryTriggers
actions.description: Grants permission to test the functionality of repository triggers by sending information to the trigger target

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate resource tags from a CodeCommit resource ARN

actions.name: UpdateApprovalRuleTemplateContent
actions.description: Grants permission to update the content of approval rule templates; does not grant permission to update content of approval rules created specifically for pull requests

actions.name: UpdateApprovalRuleTemplateDescription
actions.description: Grants permission to update the description of approval rule templates

actions.name: UpdateApprovalRuleTemplateName
actions.description: Grants permission to update the name of approval rule templates

actions.name: UpdateComment
actions.description: Grants permission to update the contents of a comment if the identity matches the identity used to create the comment

actions.name: UpdateDefaultBranch
actions.description: Grants permission to change the default branch in an AWS CodeCommit repository

actions.name: UpdatePullRequestApprovalRuleContent
actions.description: Grants permission to update the content for approval rules created for a specific pull requests; does not grant permission to update approval rule content for rules created with an approval rule template

actions.name: UpdatePullRequestApprovalState
actions.description: Grants permission to update the approval state for pull requests

actions.name: UpdatePullRequestDescription
actions.description: Grants permission to update the description of a pull request

actions.name: UpdatePullRequestStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to update the status of a pull request

actions.name: UpdatePullRequestTitle
actions.description: Grants permission to update the title of a pull request

actions.name: UpdateRepositoryDescription
actions.description: Grants permission to change the description of an AWS CodeCommit repository

actions.name: UpdateRepositoryName
actions.description: Grants permission to change the name of an AWS CodeCommit repository

actions.name: UploadArchive
actions.description: Grants permission to the service role for AWS CodePipeline to upload repository changes into a pipeline
